## This are the data

```{r}
library(tidyverse) 
```

```{r}
penguins_url <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/allisonhorst/palmerpenguins/main/inst/extdata/penguins.csv"
penguins <- read_csv(penguins_url)
```

```{r} 
penguins
```

```{r}
penguins %>% 
  jsonlite::toJSON(
    pretty = T
  ) %>% 
  {
    paste('const penguins = ', ., sep = "")
  } %>% 
  write_lines(
    'data/penguins.js'
  )
```
